meanings.definition: To injure a joint by a sudden twist or wrench
meanings.sent1: She sprained her ankle while playing soccer.
meanings.sent2: He sprained his wrist when he fell off his bike.
meanings.sent3: The cat sprained its tail trying to catch a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The tree branch sprained under the weight of the heavy snow.
meanings.sent5: The dancer sprained her knee during a difficult routine.
